description: This bold-flavored cauliflower dish is a perfect riposte to winter blues It combines three sunny Mediterranean flavors with white and wintry cauliflower, which is brightened hardily It all takes under half an hour, because the only real cooking is boiling the cauliflower, and the rest is just letting the olives, capers, chiles and some garlic and lemon get acquainted.
title: Cauliflower With Capers, Black Olives and Chiles
title_page: Cauliflower With Capers, Black Olives and Chiles Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This bold-flavored cauliflower dish is a perfect riposte to winter blues. It combines three sunny Mediterranean flavors with white and wintry cauliflower, which is brightened hardily. It all takes under half an hour, because the only real cooking is boiling the cauliflower, and the rest is just letting the olives, capers, chiles and some garlic and lemon get acquainted.
Featured in: Three Pantry Staples With The Power To Transform.
